body.name: Dash Cam Front and Rear, Avylet 4K+1080P Wi-Fi Dash Camera for Cars, Dual Dashboard Camera with APP, IPS Screen, Super Night Vision, WDR, 24H Parking Mode, 170° Wide Angle, G-Sensor, Loop Recording
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21. Order within 1 hr 22 mins
features: ⏰【Specially Curated Upgrades】Thoughtfully prepared optional 64GB SD card and hardwire kit for your selection. (📧To acquire these upgrades, simply reach out to us via email at service@avylet.com for more information. Act fast - the deadline is 18th. Feb) . 💟 Warm Tips: If you can't view the Live View in the app, try disabling phone's cellular data. If you still can't access SD card videos, download the videos to the app's album for viewing.

🚀【4K+1080P Dual Recording】Simultaneous recording in both 4K (3840*2160P) and FHD 1080P resolutions offers enhanced clarity, making recordings clearer and allowing for better visibility of essential elements like license plates and road signs. 4K and 1080P dual recording serves as crucial evidence for documentation, analysis, and potential legal matters.

📡【Bulit-in Wi-Fi & Customized Free APP】Easily customize settings, monitor live view, and replay recorded content seamlessly on both the dash cam and smartphone using the Avylet APP, without any subscription fees. The app allows you to download videos (no data usage) and instantly share them (data required) with friends and family via popular social media or messaging platforms.(💖: Turn on dashcam WiFi, return to preview mode to save settings to avoid issues finding it on your phone.)

🛫【Super Night Vision】Powered by a high-performance chipset and a SONY sensor. The device boasts an F1.6 aperture for optimized light intake and reduced motion blur, a 6-layer Glass Lens for superior scratch resistance and high-temperature tolerance, and WDR Technology for balanced exposure, reduced glare, and enhanced contrast. These features ensure clearer and more detailed video capture in low-light situations, effectively documenting road conditions.

🛸【Wide 170° Front & 150° Rear View】 Features a 170° wide-angle front and 150° rear camera lens, enabling the capture of an expansive view of the road. This design effectively minimizes blind spots, providing a comprehensive recording of your surroundings while driving.

🔭【24/7 Parking Monitor for Continuous Protection】Motion Detection: If any motion is detected within the car camera's field of view, the dashcam will initiate a 30-second video recording. Time-lapse Recording: The dashboard camera captures video efficiently at a chosen frame rate (e.g., 1/2/5/10 frames per second) while parked, highlighting important moments and saving storage space. Important Notice: To activate parking modes, you will require a hardwire kit.

✈️【Extreme Temperature-Resistant Super Capacitors】Super capacitors, often found in high-end dashcams, have a significant edge over traditional batteries. They charge rapidly, store energy efficiently, and boast a longer lifespan—extending usage by up to 30%. What's more, their remarkable tolerance for extreme heat and cold (Temperature Range: -4°F to 158°F ) and enhanced stability make them a safer choice.

🖥️【2'' IPS Screen & 360° Rotatable Bracket】The compact design and mini body ensures it can be discreetly hidden behind the rearview mirror and the concealed installation design won't obstruct your sight. You can adjust the angle of installation with the 360° rotatable bracket. In addition, the user-friendly 2" IPS screen enables you to access settings, view recordings, and capture snapshots with ease.

💨【Passionate Customer Care】Your car dash camera is backed by our comprehensive coverage, including a 1-year warranty and lifelong tech support. To access our support, simply reach out to us (refer to the contact information provided in the instruction manual) directly or visit our website at Avylet.com. Rest assured, we will respond to your inquiries within 12 hours.

🛰️【Loop Recording & G-sensor】Automatically replaces the oldest video with the newest, ensuring you always have the latest footage to view, even when your memory card is full. When a collision occurs, whether you're on the move or parked, the G-sensor locks and secures crucial video clips. This ensures you won't lose those pivotal moments, regardless of the situation.

Doesn't connect to the cellphone? 1. Confirm you've downloaded and installed the correct version of Avylet app. 2. Check the phone's Wi-Fi connection, ensure it's connected to the dashcam's Wi-Fi network. 3. Try turning off and on Wi-Fi on your phone, then attempt to reconnect. Is there a subscription fee for the Avylet app? No, the Avylet app is completely free. Whether you download this app from the App Store or Google Play, there's no need for any subscription fees. Additionally, when using the Avylet app to download videos, no data or charges are required. Is it possible to save a video to a mobile phone album? The Avylet APP allows direct video downloads to your phone's album or the APP album. You can access to videos without using data. The screen asked for SD card, after put in SD card the screen all black. Removed SD card then turn on still black. Why? Insert the SD card while dash cam is off, then connect it to power source using the original car charger. Format the SD card as FAT32 to ensure proper functionality. Supports up to 128GB SD Card. Using a larger card may cause crashes or shutdowns.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very decent little camera
reviews.reviewText: This camera gives very clear images and is extremely responsive. Only thing I wish was that it would download videos to my phone automatically instead of having to do it myself. Install was very easy and we were able to tuck the cords so they don't show at all. I would recommend this to family members and friends.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I like this deshcam because it is easy to setup. Video quality is awesome and I am very satisfied with this camera.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Gets the job done.
reviews.reviewText: Customer service non-existent for any issues.

reviews.reviewerName: its really easy to use. the features are great and the image is really good.
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars great dash cam
reviews.reviewText: its really worth it and easy to use. great image and very easy to set up. highly recommended

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy Install. Great product! App is a real bonus.
reviews.reviewText: This is a great dashcam. It was so easy to install and having an app really makes it more simple! I really love this dashcam. I have had 2 others before that were cheap and they were okay but didn't last long. So happy I got this one!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The size can sit right behind the rear view mirror and is not distracting at night which is what I’m looking for. Packaging is really neat and installation is easy!! Video quality is superb. Will definitely recommend this to friends and families.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super easy set up
reviews.reviewText: Really happy I grabbed this. Easy to set up and plug in. Sets up via app and the camera takes a memory card. Definitely recommend for a good functioning camera at a fair price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to install
reviews.reviewText: Very easy to install and works perfectly great!
